HomePage.greeting: Customers go dash you money once we don finish work for your website
HomePage.MOTIVATION: My journey wey carry me enter web development start with my brothers and sisters wey encourage me make i try tech. At first, e hard me because i no know how i go take enter the field, but i don alreay put my mind say i go learn how to code one day. As i dey watch films, i dey always admire that idea wey dem dey call 'laptop and hoodie'. This new interest come make me start to dey try HTML and CSS, I use my secondary schood days build front-end websites and dey explore CSS animations through trial and error, as i dey tech now, i nor fit imagine myself for any other place.
HomePage.ctaTitle: You dey feel our work abi?
HomePage.ctaDescription: if you get project for mind, nor waste time bring am come.

Features.firstDescription: If we don build your website finish, you don check am and you nor just like wetin you dey see just tell us we go give you your money complete.
Features.secondDescription: After we don build your website and you don settle us finish we go give you better hamper, wey we dey use take say thank you.
Features.thirdDescription: If you never build website with us before we go give you reach 20% discount for next time you wan build again
Features.fourthDescription: You must to collect MR Eseosa jotter before you commot wey you fit use take alert your friends where you build your website.

Projects.jatinz: Come experience the vibrant spirit of Naija for here, your correct place to find authentic Nigerian-made products.
Projects.norbileFoods: Cheap and affordable chop wey dem go deliver anywhere fo Benin.
Projects.sbp: Collect room wey fine finish from our ogbonge hotel
Projects.gemini: Come find safe way wey you go fit buy and sell crypto.
Projects.esefabrics: The only place where dem dey see drip wey nor nor be okrika

404.title: Wahala...
404.description: E be like say the link wey you use nor dey work again or e fit be say the page nor dey before.

Contact.title: Hala Us
Contact.description: You fit use email take reach us make we talk.

Course.title: E dey Come
Course.description: We dey work dey and night make we bring lessons wey dey enter head

animations.title: Animations wey dey give me joy
